file.string: Share your location with your \n friend and family

string.name: privacy_policy_phone_sign_up
string.u: By signing up you accept privacy policy

file.string: Perfect! You\'re about to join\nyour Family
You may need to ask circle to send code
We\'ll give you code to share
You can create Circle for every group.
Share this Invite code with\nyour Family
This code will be active for 3 days
Location sharing is possible only with mutual consent of all family members.
Perfect! You\'re about to join\nyour family
Find My Family required these\nPermissions to work
This makes it easy for your\nfamily to find you on map
Add places your friends and\nfamily visit, like Home office
Enter the phone number associated\nwith your account and we\'ll send an\nOTP to update your password
We have sent an OTP to
Your new password must be different\nfrom previous used passwords.
Your GPS setting must be turned on for Find my Family to work. Please turn on your GPS
Find my Family only works correctly if it\n access location \'\'All the time\'\'
Find my Family only works correctly if it\n access activity \'\'All the time\'\'
1. In Find My Family info, click Permissions
The email address is already in use by another account.
Enter the email associated with your\naccount and we\'ll send an email with\ninstructions to reset your password.
We have sent a password recovery\nlink to your email.
Did not receive email? Check your spam filter,\nor try another email address
Emergency Contact will be notified once timer goes off
needs your help. Tap to view current Location
SMS permission is required to send live location message to added emergency contact(s) when Emergency SOS is triggered
Send a message or reply\nwith a greeting sticker\nbelow!
Can you please share your current location?
No Members. Add member in circle and start chatting
This operation is sensitive and requires recent authentication. Log in again before retrying this request.
This operation requires recent authentication. Log in again before retrying this request.
No members in this circle found!
For better your experience, FindMyFamily needs access of your location in background (when app is not in use). For this \"all the time\" permission is required
Unable to prepare invite code \n Please make a circle first
FindMyFamily only works correctly if it can access your activity \"all the time\"

This app collects location data to enable tracking even when the app is closed or not in use.\n This app also use background location service to share accurate location information with the members in circle which you will create or join. Without this permission the core functionality of the application will not work.
Share your location with your \n friend and family
